name: Fluent UI set up with story.to.design
description:
Fluent UI is Microsoft's design system.

This Figma library is generated directly from code, via Fluent's Storybook website, using story.to.design plugin.


ðŸŽ¯ What's inside:

  • A page documenting all components with links to their Storybook page
  • 22 Figma components with their variants


This is a complete Figma UI kit with hundreds of variants that was created in just minutes. With story.to.design designers can focus on creating new designs, not maintaining UI kits.
